CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 19, 1958, pg. 1, reads: "Family of the Year - Exemplifying neighborliness, civic spirit, and use of neighborhood houses, the O. Norman Crawfords of Coraopolis were crowned 'Family of the Year' Tuesday by Mayor Lawrence to inaugurate Neighborhood House Week in this area. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence crowning Dorothy Crawford, with her husband Norman, son David, and daughter, as "family of the year"
